name.en: Practical Discussion on Net Zero Emission

notice.ch: 授課教師:鍾文杰、郭子鈺

department.ch: 永續去碳科技碩士學位學程

remark.ch: 授課教師:鍾文杰、郭子鈺

goal.ch: 本課程將從外部業師角度以全方位的探討企業溫室氣體排放與碳足跡的來源，並從企業角度探討如何從執行科學減碳、內部碳定價、綠電採購與供應鏈減碳。另外，從產品生命週期中以原料的角度出發，如何以經濟、少碳的材料選用之選材策略出發，更深入的探討企業材料選用的問題，進而根據材料使用情境工況選用適合之材料。
goal.en: This course will comprehensively discuss corporate greenhouse gas emissions and carbon footprint sources from the viewpoint of external experts and how to execute scientific carbon reduction, internal carbon pricing, green energy procurement, and supply chain carbon reduction from a corporate standpoint. Furthermore, starting from the perspective of raw materials in a product life cycle, it will further discuss the selection of materials with an economic and low-carbon material selection strategy. Besides, exploring the issues of corporate material selection and then selecting suitable materials based on the material usage context.

outline.ch:
第1週  全球淨零發展趨勢分析
第2週  ISO 14064-1 組織型溫室氣體盤查介紹
第3週  ISO 14064-1 組織型溫室氣體實務案例介紹
第4週  ISO 14064-1 專案分組報告
第5週  科學基礎減量目標介紹
第6週  內部碳定價實務介紹
第7週  綠電採購與供應鏈減碳實務介紹
第8週  期中考週－期中報告繳交與報告
第9週  工程材料簡介
第10週  機械設計中的材料選擇議題（一）
第11週  機械設計中的材料選擇議題（二）
第12週  工程材料選擇與減碳策略（一）
第13週  工程材料選擇與減碳策略（二）
第14週  森林與木業
第15週  自然碳匯與林木固碳效益評估
第16週  期末考週－期末報告繳交與報告
outline.en:
Week 1 - Analyze Global Net Zero Trend
Week 2 - Introduction to ISO 14064-1 Greenhouse Gas
Week 3 - Introduction to ISO 14064-1 Greenhouse Gas Practical Case
Week 4 - ISO 14064-1 Team Report
Week 5 - Introduction to Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi) Practices
Week 6 - Introduction to Internal Carbon Price Practices
Week 7 - Introduction to Taiwan Renewable Electricity and Supplier Chain Decarbonization Practices Practices
Week 8 - Midterm Examination - Midterm Report Submission and Presentation
Week 9 - Introduction of Engineering Materials
Week 10 - Materials Selection in Mechanical Design I
Week 11 - Materials Selection in Mechanical Design II
Week 12 - Selection Strategy of Eco-informed and Low-carbon Materials I
Week 13 - Selection Strategy of Eco-informed and Low-carbon Materials II
Week 14 - Natural Carbon Sink and Benefit Assessment of Carbon Sequestration I
Week 15 - Natural Carbon Sink and Benefit Assessment of Carbon Sequestration II
Week 16 - Final Examination - Final Report Submission and Presentation
